name: DerangeDoodle
description:
A doodle being, who lives in a ludic world made of sketches and collages, goes into a desperate adventure, looking for erasers to stabilize their unstable and sketchy nature, and finally find their inner peace.

CONTROLS:

Z - Select, Jump

X - Punch

Arrow Keys - Move

How to Play:

As time goes on, you get more unstable, collect erasers to stable yourself back.

Some things may interact different depending on your instability level.
